channel.title: Dialogues and Actions?
channel.description: I downloaded the Project16 V.6 source, and i was attempting to add ghostly bankers and have them work like normal bankers. 2 things, is this correct? [code] dialogue = 1702 1 1703 Welcome_to_the_bank Would_you_like_me_to_get_your_stuff? EMPTY dialogue = 1703 2 1 0 0 1 0 Select_an_option Sure! No_Thanks. EMPTY [/code] I did use tabs so i know nothings wrong there... I cant even get it to pull up frame 200... Im kinda new to this so please dont flame...[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 23, 2008, 04:47:26 AM[/size][hr]anyone?

item.title: Dialogues and Actions?
item.dc:creator: @Striker10777 Striker10777
item.description:
@Striker10777 wrote:

I downloaded the Project16 V.6 source, and i was attempting to add ghostly bankers and have them work like normal bankers. 2 things, is this correct?

dialogue = 1702	1	1703	Welcome_to_the_bank	Would_you_like_me_to_get_your_stuff?	EMPTY
dialogue = 1703	2	1	0	0	1	0	Select_an_option	Sure!	No_Thanks.	EMPTY

I did use tabs so i know nothings wrong there…
I cant even get it to pull up frame 200…
Im kinda new to this so please dont flame…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 23, 2008, 04:47:26 AM[/size][hr]anyone?

Read full topic
